name: PHOTON CUBE
description: PHOTON CUBE is a unique puzzle game which utilizes the properties of light.All you need is a little bit of [knowledge about light] and your [endless imagination].A cute looking Action Puzzle Game with a hearty serving of challenge!Welcome to the intelligent and magnificent world of PHOTON CUBE!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), 8, 10 (64bit edition only) Processor: SSE2 Extension Command Set Compatible Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
